topics.legion overview: Adds a second faction called Legion to the game, with the original faction being the Machine Liberation Army (MLA). The Legion were created by the Progenitors to help defeat the MLA. They are slower and more expensive, but compenstate by being both tougher and harder hitting.
topics.legion help: To play as the Legion select one of the red Commanders. A shared army with MLA and Legion Commanders can build units from both factions, but you cannot stack Legion and MLA metal extractors.
